AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Raul Rafael Arce-Jasso: defendant in a criminal case involving cocaine discovered during an immigration stop, argued against the United States of America's right to appeal the judgment for acquittal
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States of America: party in the appeal, appellant regarding post-verdict suppression order, responsible for filing notice of appeal within 30 days after suppression decision is final, restricted by the law of the case doctrine
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States Court of Appeals: court hearing the appeal, bound by the law of the case doctrine
